article: There _ a king who had twelve beautiful daughters. They _ in twelve beds all in one room and when they went to bed, the _ were shut and locked up. _ , every morning _ shoes were found to be quite worn through as if they had been danced in all night. Nobody could _ how it happened, or _ the princesses had been. So the king made it _ to all that if any person could discover the _ and find out where it was that the princesses danced in the _ , he would have the _ he liked best to take as his wife, and would be king _ his death. But whoever tried and did not succeed, after three days and nights, would be _ to death. A prince from a nearby country soon came. He was well entertained, and in the evening was taken to the chamber next _ the one where the princesses lay in their twelve _ . There he was to sit and _ where they went to dance; and, in order _ nothing could happen without him hearing it, the door of his _ was left open. But the prince soon went to sleep; and when he _ in the morning he found that the princesses had all been dancing, _ the soles of their shoes were full of holes
